page.title: 07DAY AT SCHOOL IN EVERCREECH
page.content:
MY DAY by Andrew Boyce aged nine
Wake at 7-o'clock.Wash and dress.Breakfast of Corn Flakes.Leave for School at 8-50.Go to classroom at 9-o'clock.Assembly until 9-30.Maths and English until Break at 10-35.TV programme at 10-50,followed by a discussion of the programme and a picture to draw.Lunch of sandwiches at 12-15.Start work again at 1-15.Reading time until 1-30.Finish work from morning.Break at 2-15 for ten minutes.Swimming or other sports until 3-15.Go home by car or walk some days.Mum makes a cup of tea.Go out to play until 5-o'clock.Watch "Childrens ITV" on TV.Have salad for tea at 6-00.Out to play again until 7-00.Watch TV again,before bath and bed by about quarter to nine.
